short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects the URL if it matches the Target URL from the central Database. Tzunami Inc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Tzunami URL Redirection" is a versatile Chrome extension designed to enhance web navigation for users of Tzunami Deployer, a leading product by Tzunami Inc. This powerful tool offers precise URL redirection capabilities, ensuring that when the extension is enabled, source URLs seamlessly redirect to their respective target URLs.

Key Features:

Effortless URL Redirection: With a single click, your source URLs are automatically redirected to their intended destinations.

Centralized Client-Hosted Database: Our extension leverages a centralized database hosted in your client environment. This guarantees quick and reliable access to your redirection data.

Secure API Communication: Secure communication between the extension and database via a robust API. Your data remains safe and accessible.

License Requirement: To access the full power of "Tzunami URL Redirection," users must obtain a valid license issued by Tzunami Inc. These licenses are exclusively provided to individuals and customers who require URL redirection.

Admin Panel is provided for the administrator where they can add and modify users according to the requirement. Admin Panel is accessible only after using the valid credentials from Tzunami Inc.

Note: This extension is exclusively available to licensed Tzunami Deployer users, ensuring that you have the tools you need to navigate the web efficiently.
